posts.title: This is a blog post
posts.author: Esther
posts.body: Learn to code for free. freeCodeCamp's open source curriculum has helped more than 40,000 people get jobs as developers.

posts.title: What is a blog post
posts.author: Brainy
posts.body: A blog post is a single piece of content published on a blog, a shortened form of the now-archaic term weblog, which is an online platform for publishing written content. A blog can be a section of a website or a standalone website of its own.

posts.title: Effect Cleanup
posts.author: Danny
posts.body:
Some effects require cleanup to reduce memory leaks.

Timeouts, subscriptions, event listeners, and other effects that are no longer needed should be disposed.

We do this by including a return function at the end of the useEffect Hook.
